page.title: 16Health in our D-block
page.content: In our local{health clinic}here in Bellfield babies are taken by their mothers to be{weighed}and have {injections}to protect them against {disease. Children}from Bellfield Primary School have their teeth checked regularly by the{dentist}at the clinic. At the clinic there are {doctors}and dentists available for everyone to see.{Many older people}go to the clinic to see the{chiropodist to have their feet checked. Some are not able to do their housework or look after themselves properly. Sometimes a vistor called a{"Home Help"}from the Health Service visits these old people to help with housework and shopping. A {"Meals on Wheels"}service is also available to make sure that old people are properly fed.
